snippet: In an extraordinary feat, Russian scientists reached an enormous freshwater lake more than two miles beneath the ice-covered surface of Antarctica.
abstract: Editorial praises Russian scientists for reaching Lake Vostok, the enormous body of water more than two miles beneath the ice-covered surface of Antarctica, after years of drilling; asserts that this extraordinary engineering feat has opened up many significant research opportunities.
lead_paragraph: In an extraordinary feat, Russian scientists reached an enormous freshwater lake more than two miles beneath the ice-covered surface of Antarctica.
